comments:
I get this NPE when invoking Persistence -> Generate Entities. The project was created in another workspace imported into an existing workspace. It worked the first time when I created the project according to the tutorial.

It seems that you have a version of the code where we had problems with case sensitivity and the schema.  If you open the project Properties ->Persistence you can choose a schema, if it is not already chosen.  Also, get the latest code and the case sensitive problem is fixed.
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
